00029 // Space Ship Mode matrix
00030 GLdouble ssmMatrix[16] = {1, 0, 0, 0,
00031                           0, 1, 0, 0,
00032                           0, 0, 1, 0,
00033                           0, 0, 0, 1};
00034 // Free Look Mode matrix
00035 GLdouble flmMatrix[16] = {1, 0, 0, 0,
00036                           0, 1, 0, 0,
00037                           0, 0, 1, 0,
00038                           0, 0, 0, 1};
00039 // Temporary matrix used for some auxiliary calculations

00041                           0, 1, 0, 0,
00042                           0, 0, 1, 0,
00043                           0, 0, 0, 1};

00051 cGLWidget::cGLWidget(QGLFormat fmt, cMainWindow *parent)
00052     : QGLWidget(fmt, parent)
00053 {

00055     
00056     // setting focus policy (to accept key pressing in this widget)
00057     setFocusPolicy(Qt::StrongFocus);
00058 
00059     // catching parent parameter
00060     parentCWidget = parent;
00061     format = fmt;
00062 
00063     polygonMode = GL_FILL;

00091     objCamXrot = objCamYrot = 0.0;
00092 
00093     // free look mode data
00094     flmX = flmY = flmZ = 0.0;
00095     flmXrot = flmYrot = flmZrot = 0.0;
00096

00099     objXrot = objZrot = 0.0;
00100     effectXrot = effectZrot = 0.0;
00101 
00102     // real camera coordinates

00107     upY = 1.0;
00108     upZ = 0.0;

00114 
00115

00117     // animation timer (start/stop in playPause() and reset() methods)

00119     connect(&animationTimer, SIGNAL(timeout()), this, SLOT(animate()));
00120 
00121     /* GAME OBJECTS */

00127

00177 void cGLWidget::initializeGL()
00178 {
00179     qglClearColor(wormhole->purple.dark());
00180     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00181     glClearDepth(1.0f);
00182 
00183     /* normalizing */
00184     //glEnable(GL_RESCALE_NORMAL);
00185     glEnable(GL_NORMALIZE);
00186 
00187     /* flat / smooth */
00188     //glShadeModel(GL_FLAT);
00189     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00190 
00191     /* Anti-aliasing / Multisampling */
00192     glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00193     setAAMS();
00194 
00195     /* fill / lines / points */
00196     glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, polygonMode);
00197 
00198     /* MATERIAL */
00199     glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_AMBIENT_AND_DIFFUSE);
00200     glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00201     // glCullFace(GL_BACK);
00202     // glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00203 
00204     /* LIGHTS */
00205     glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00206     //glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00207     glLightModeli(GL_LIGHT_MODEL_TWO_SIDE, 1);
00208 
00209     GLfloat light1_ambient[] = {0.2, 0.2, 0.2, 1.0};
00210     GLfloat light1_diffuse[] = {1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0};
00211     GLfloat light1_specular[] = {1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0};
00212     GLfloat light1_position[] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0};
00213     //GLfloat spot_direction[] = {0.0, 0.0, -0.2};
00214 
00215     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT1, GL_AMBIENT, light1_ambient);
00216     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT1, GL_DIFFUSE, light1_diffuse);
00217     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT1, GL_SPECULAR, light1_specular);
00218 
00219     //glLightf(GL_LIGHT1, GL_CONSTANT_ATTENUATION, 1.5);
00220     //glLightf(GL_LIGHT1, GL_LINEAR_ATTENUATION, 0.9);
00221     //glLightf(GL_LIGHT1, GL_QUADRATIC_ATTENUATION, 0.3);
00222 
00223     glLightf(GL_LIGHT1, GL_CONSTANT_ATTENUATION, 2.0);
00224     glLightf(GL_LIGHT1, GL_LINEAR_ATTENUATION, 0.0);
00225     glLightf(GL_LIGHT1, GL_QUADRATIC_ATTENUATION, 0.0);
00226 
00227     //glLightf(GL_LIGHT1, GL_SPOT_CUTOFF, 135.0);
00228     //glLightfv(GL_LIGHT1, GL_SPOT_DIRECTION, spot_direction);
00229     //glLightf(GL_LIGHT1, GL_SPOT_EXPONENT, 2.0);
00230 
00231     glEnable(GL_LIGHT1);
00232 
00233     // set point light in 0,0,0 (viewport)
00234     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00235     glLoadIdentity();
00236     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT1, GL_POSITION, light1_position);
00237     //glLightfv(GL_LIGHT1, GL_SPOT_DIRECTION, spot_direction);
00238 
00239 
00240     /* TEXTURES */
00241     glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);        /* zpusob ulozeni bytu v texture */
00242     glTexEnvi(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_MODULATE);
00243 
00244     // when texture area is small, bilinear filter the closest mipmap
00245     glTexParameterf( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER,
00246                      GL_LINEAR_MIPMAP_NEAREST );
00247     // when texture area is large, bilinear filter the original
00248     glTexParameterf( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR );
00249 
00250     // the texture wraps over at the edges (repeat)
00251     glTexParameterf( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_REPEAT );
00252     glTexParameterf( GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_REPEAT );
00253 
00254     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00255 
00256     /* initializeGL() is called once whenever the widget has been assigned a
00257     new QGLContext (e.g. toggle fullscreen). However making display lists from
00258     obj files takes some time and therefore will be called only once. We don't
00259     need to load textures either.*/
00260     if(bFirstInit)
00261     {
00262         // textures
00263         glGenTextures(1, &textureWormhole);
00264         if(LoadTextureFromBMP("./images/wormhole_texture.bmp", textureWormhole))
00265             glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureWormhole);
00266 
00267         wormhole->object =
00268             wormhole->makeDisplayList(parentCWidget->settings_polygons);
00269         ufo->object = ufo->makeDisplayList();
00270         //obj1->object = obj1->makeDisplayList();
00271         //obj2->object = obj2->makeDisplayList();
00272         //obj3->object = obj3->makeDisplayList();
00273         bFirstInit = GL_FALSE;
00274 
00275         resetUfo();
00276         resetCamera(true);
00277     }
00278 }

00287 void cGLWidget::resizeGL(int w, int h)
00288 {
00289     width = w;
00290     height = h;
00291 
00292     glViewport(0, 0, width, height);
00293 
00294     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00295         glLoadIdentity();
00296         gluPerspective(45.0, (GLdouble) width/height, 0.0001, 100.0);
00297     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00298 }
00299 
00311 void cGLWidget::paintGL()
00312 {
00313     /* FPS calculation */
00314     if(fpsTime.elapsed() < 1000)
00315     {
00316         fps += 1;
00317     }
00318     else
00319     {
00320         strFps = QString(" FPS: %1").arg(fps, 0, 10);
00321         fps = 0;
00322         fpsTime.restart();
00323     }
00324 
00325     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00326     
00327     /* DYNAMIC SETTINGS >> */
00328 
00329     // polygone mode (fill / line / point)
00330     glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, polygonMode);
00331     if(polygonMode == GL_POINT) glPointSize(4.0);
00332     else glPointSize(1.0);
00333 
00334     // Anti-aliasing / Multisampling
00335     setAAMS();
00336 
00337     /* << DYNAMIC SETTINGS */
00338 
00339     if(bPause) // free look mode
00340     {
00341         glLoadIdentity();
00342         if ((flmXrot != 0.0) || (flmYrot != 0.0) || (flmZrot != 0.0) ||
00343             (flmX != 0.0) || (flmY != 0.0) || (flmZ != 0.0)) {
00344             if (flmXrot != 0.0)
00345             {
00346                 glRotatef(flmXrot/16., 1,0,0);
00347                 flmXrot = 0.0;
00348             }
00349             if (flmYrot != 0.0)
00350             {
00351                 glRotatef(flmYrot/16., 0,1,0);
00352                 flmYrot = 0.0;
00353             }
00354             if (flmZrot != 0.0)
00355             {
00356                 glRotatef(flmZrot/16., 0,0,1);
00357                 flmZrot = 0.0;
00358             }
00359             //glTranslatef (0, 0, 0.1);
00360             glTranslatef(flmX, flmY, flmZ);
00361             flmX = flmY = flmZ = 0.0;
00362             //glTranslatef (0, 0, -0.1);
00363             glMultMatrixd(flmMatrix);
00364             glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, flmMatrix);
00365         }
00366 
00367         // paint scene
00368         glLoadIdentity();
00369         glMultMatrixd (flmMatrix);
00370 
00371         // draw ufo
00372         glPushMatrix();
00373 //            glTranslatef (0.0, 0.0, -0.1); // move object away from camera
00374             glMultMatrixd(ssmMatrix);
00375             qglColor(QColor::fromRgb(150, 150, 150));
00376             glCallList(ufo->object);
00377         glPopMatrix();
00378 
00379         // draw wormhole
00380         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureWormhole);
00381         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00382             glCallList(wormhole->object);
00383         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00384 
00385         // draw spline dots in wormhole (navigation)
00386         if(parentCWidget->settings_navigation)
00387         {
00388 
00389             glPointSize(5.0);
00390             qglColor(QColor::fromRgb(255, 0, 0));
00391             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00392                 for (int i=0; i<wormhole->whSectors; i++)
00393                 {
00394                     glVertex3f(wormhole->sectors[i].splinePoint.x,
00395                                wormhole->sectors[i].splinePoint.y,
00396                                wormhole->sectors[i].splinePoint.z);
00397                 }
00398             glEnd();
00399             glPointSize(1.0);
00400         }
00401 
00402     }
00403     else // space ship mode
00404     {
00405         // local rotation and translation of objects (ufo, ..) and camera
00406         glLoadMatrixd(ssmMatrix);
00407             glRotatef(objXrot, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00408             glRotatef(objZrot, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
00409             glTranslatef(0,0,objForward);
00410         glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, ssmMatrix);
00411 
00412         // object position
00413         ufo->pos.x = ssmMatrix[12];
00414         ufo->pos.y = ssmMatrix[13];
00415         ufo->pos.z = ssmMatrix[14];
00416 
00417         glLoadMatrixd(ssmMatrix);
00418             glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, 0.001);
00419         glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, tmpMatrix);
00420 
00421         // eye position (used in gluLookAt() function)
00422         camX = tmpMatrix[12];
00423         camY = tmpMatrix[13];
00424         camZ = tmpMatrix[14];
00425 
00426         glLoadMatrixd(ssmMatrix);
00427             glTranslatef(0.0, 1.00, 0.0);
00428         glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, tmpMatrix);
00429 
00430         // up vector shall not move with object, just rotate
00431         upX = tmpMatrix[12] - ufo->pos.x;
00432         upY = tmpMatrix[13] - ufo->pos.y;
00433         upZ = tmpMatrix[14] - ufo->pos.z;
00434 
00435         objXrot = objZrot = 0.0;
00436         objForward = 0.0;
00437 
00438         // paint scene
00439         glLoadIdentity();
00440 
00441         // draw ufo
00442         glTranslatef (0.0, 0.0, -(ufo->radius*12.0)+objCamZoom);
00443         glRotatef(objCamXrot/16, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00444         glRotatef(objCamYrot/16, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00445         glPushMatrix();
00446             glRotatef(effectXrot, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00447             glRotatef(effectZrot, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
00448             qglColor(QColor::fromRgb(150, 150, 150));
00449             glCallList(ufo->object);
00450         glPopMatrix();
00451 
00452         // set camera
00453         gluLookAt(camX, camY, camZ, ufo->pos.x, ufo->pos.y, ufo->pos.z, upX, upY, upZ);
00454 
00455         // draw wormhole
00456         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureWormhole);
00457         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00458             glCallList(wormhole->object);
00459         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00460 
00461         // draw spline dots in wormhole (avigation)
00462         if(parentCWidget->settings_navigation)
00463         {
00464             glPointSize(5.0);
00465             qglColor(QColor::fromRgb(255, 0, 0));
00466             glBegin(GL_POINTS);
00467                 for (int i=0; i<wormhole->whSectors; i++)
00468                 {
00469                     glVertex3f(wormhole->sectors[i].splinePoint.x,
00470                                wormhole->sectors[i].splinePoint.y,
00471                                wormhole->sectors[i].splinePoint.z);
00472                 }
00473             glEnd();
00474             glPointSize(1.0);
00475         }
00476     }
00477     // text rendering
00478     strScore = QString(" SCORE: %1").arg(score, 10);
00479     glColor3f(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00480     renderText(10, 10, strFps);
00481     glColor3f(1.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00482     renderText(width - 10 - strScore.size()*4, 10, strScore);
00483 }
00484 
00490 float cGLWidget::pointToLineDistance(sPoint3 point, sPoint3 A, sPoint3 B)
00491 {
00492     float d;
00493     //d = fabs((x0 - x1) x (x0 - x2))/fabs(x2 - x1)
00494     vec3 x01(point.x - A.x, point.y - A.y, point.z - A.z);
00495     vec3 x02(point.x - B.x, point.y - B.y, point.z - B.z);
00496     vec3 x21(B.x - A.x, B.y - A.y, B.z - A.z);
00497     d = fabs(x01.CrossProduct(x02).Magnitude())/fabs(x21.Magnitude());
00498     return d;
00499 }
00500 
00506 void cGLWidget::myglAlignVectorToVector(float servant_x, float servant_y,
00507                                         float servant_z, float master_x,
00508                                         float master_y, float master_z)
00509 {
00510     vec3 u(servant_x, servant_y, servant_z);
00511     vec3 v(master_x, master_y, master_z);
00512     vec3 n = u.CrossProduct(v);
00513     n = n / n.Magnitude();
00514     float phi = acos(u.Dot(v)/(u.Magnitude()*v.Magnitude()));
00515 
00516     /* n    - unit vector along the axis of rotation
00517        phi  - angle of rotation */
00518     glRotatef(phi/piover180, n.x, n.y, n.z);
00519 
00520 //    // rotation matrix
00521 //    float t = 1-cos(phi);
00522 //    float a = n.x;
00523 //    float b = n.y;
00524 //    float c = n.z;
00525 //    float s=sin(phi);
00526 //    float d=cos(phi);
00527 //    GLdouble rot[16] = {t*a*a+d,     t*a*b + s*c, t*a*c - s*b, 0,
00528 //                        t*a*b-s*c,   t*b*b+d,     t*b*c+s*a,   0,
00529 //                        t*a*c + s*b, t*b*c - a*s, t*c*c + d,   0,
00530 //                        0,           0,           0,           1};
00531 //
00532 //    glMultMatrixd(rot);
00533 }
00534 
00540 void cGLWidget::setAAMS()
00541 {
00542     if(parentCWidget->settings_multisampling != 0 && format.sampleBuffers())
00543     {
00544         glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00545         glDisable(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH);
00546         glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00547         glDisable(GL_POINT_SMOOTH);
00548         glEnable(GL_MULTISAMPLE);
00549     } else
00550     {
00551         glDisable(GL_MULTISAMPLE);
00552         // Anti-aliasing
00553         glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00554         glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00555         glEnable(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH);
00556         glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00557         glEnable(GL_POINT_SMOOTH);
00558         if(parentCWidget->settings_antialiasing == 1)
00559         {
00560             glHint(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_FASTEST);
00561             glHint(GL_LINE_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_FASTEST);
00562             glHint(GL_POINT_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_FASTEST);
00563         } else
00564         if(parentCWidget->settings_antialiasing == 2)
00565         {
00566             glHint(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_DONT_CARE);
00567             glHint(GL_LINE_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_DONT_CARE);
00568             glHint(GL_POINT_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_DONT_CARE);
00569         } else
00570         if(parentCWidget->settings_antialiasing == 3)
00571         {
00572             glHint(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00573             glHint(GL_LINE_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00574             glHint(GL_POINT_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_FASTEST);
00575         } else
00576         {
00577             glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00578             glDisable(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH);
00579             glDisable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00580             glDisable(GL_POINT_SMOOTH);
00581         }
00582     }
00583 }
00584 
00592 void cGLWidget::playPause()
00593 {
00594     bPause=!bPause;
00595     if(bPause)
00596     { // PAUSE
00597         parentCWidget->playPauseAction->setIcon(QIcon("./images/play.png"));
00598         parentCWidget->playPauseAction->setToolTip(tr("Play"));
00599 
00600         resetCamera();
00601 
00602         animationTimer.start(10);
00603     }
00604     else
00605     { // PLAY
00606         parentCWidget->playPauseAction->setIcon(QIcon("./images/pause.png"));
00607         parentCWidget->playPauseAction->setToolTip(tr("Pause"));
00608 
00609         resetCamera();
00610 
00611         lastPaintTime.restart();
00612         animationTimer.start(0);
00613     }
00614     this->setFocus();
00615 }
00616 
00625 void cGLWidget::reset()
00626 {
00627     bPause = true;
00628 
00629     wormhole->initializeWormholeCoordinates();
00630     recreateWormhole();
00631 
00632     resetUfo();
00633     resetCamera(true);
00634 
00635     parentCWidget->playPauseAction->setIcon(QIcon("./images/play.png"));
00636     parentCWidget->playPauseAction->setToolTip(tr("Play"));
00637 }
00638 
00644 void cGLWidget::moveObjects()
00645 {
00646     float lpTime = lastPaintTime.elapsed();
00647 
00648     if(bSpace)
00649     {
00650         //lpTime += 15;
00651         objForward -= 0.002 * lpTime;
00652     }
00653 
00654     if(bDown)
00655     {
00656         objXrot += 0.1 * lpTime;
00657         flmZ -= 0.001 * lpTime;
00658         if(effectXrot < 30.0) // cca 30�
00659             effectXrot += 0.1 * lpTime;
00660     } else if(!bUp && effectXrot > 0.0)
00661     {
00662         effectXrot -= 0.1 * lpTime;
00663     }
00664 
00665     if(bUp)
00666     {
00667         objXrot -= 0.1 * lpTime;
00668         flmZ += 0.001 * lpTime;
00669         if(effectXrot > -30.0) // cca -30�
00670             effectXrot -= 0.1 * lpTime;
00671     } else if(!bDown && effectXrot < 0.0)
00672     {
00673         effectXrot += 0.1 * lpTime;
00674     }
00675 
00676     if(bLeft)
00677     {
00678         objZrot += 0.1 * lpTime;
00679         flmX += 0.001 * lpTime;
00680         if(effectZrot < 30.0) // cca 30�
00681             effectZrot += 0.1 * lpTime;
00682     } else if(!bRight && effectZrot > 0.0)
00683     {
00684         effectZrot -= 0.1 * lpTime;
00685     }
00686 
00687     if(bRight)
00688     {
00689         objZrot -= 0.1 * lpTime;
00690         flmX -= 0.001 * lpTime;
00691         if(effectZrot > -30.0) // cca -30�
00692             effectZrot -= 0.1 * lpTime;
00693     } else if(!bLeft && effectZrot < 0.0)
00694     {
00695         effectZrot += 0.1 * lpTime;
00696     }
00697 
00698     objForward -= 0.0005 * lpTime;
00699     lastPaintTime.restart();
00700 }
00701 
00715 void cGLWidget::animate()
00716 {
00717     moveObjects();
00718     if(!bPause)
00719     {
00720         checkCollisions();
00721         checkWormhole(); // whether new sector needs to be generated
00722         setScore();
00723     }
00724     updateGL();
00725 }
00726 
00735 void cGLWidget::checkCollisions()
00736 {
00737     collision = 0;
00738     for (int j=1; j<this->wormhole->whSectors-1; j++)
00739     {
00740         if((this->wormhole->sectors[j-1].splinePoint.x < this->ufo->pos.x) &&
00741            (this->ufo->pos.x < this->wormhole->sectors[j].splinePoint.x))
00742         {
00743 
00744              //d = fabs((x0 - x1) x (x0 - x2))/fabs(x2 - x1)
00745              distance = pointToLineDistance(ufo->pos,
00746                                             wormhole->sectors[j-1].splinePoint,
00747                                             wormhole->sectors[j].splinePoint);
00748             if(wormhole->sectors[j-1].radius <= distance + ufo->radius)
00749             {
00750                 collision += 1;
00751             }
00752         }
00753     }
00754 
00755     if(collision != 0)
00756     {
00757         if(parentCWidget->settings_bestscore < score)
00758         {
00759             parentCWidget->settings_bestscore = (int) score;
00760             parentCWidget->label_bestscore->setText(
00761                 QString("Best score: ") +
00762                 QString().number(parentCWidget->settings_bestscore, 10) +
00763                 QString(" "));
00764         }
00765         score = 0;
00766         reset();
00767         reset();
00768     }
00769 }
00770 
00777 void cGLWidget::setScore()
00778 {
00779     if(ufo->pos.x * 10 > score)
00780     {
00781         score = (int) ufo->pos.x * 10;
00782     }
00783 }
00784 
00792 void cGLWidget::resetCamera(bool perspective)
00793 {
00794     // stop moving
00795     bUp = false;
00796     bDown = false;
00797     bLeft = false;
00798     bRight = false;
00799     bSpace = false;
00800 
00801     flmXrot = flmYrot = flmZrot = 0.0;
00802     flmX = flmY = flmZ = 0.0;
00803     objCamZoom = 0.0;
00804     objCamXrot = objCamYrot = 0.0;
00805 
00806     objXrot = objZrot = 0.0;
00807     objForward = 0.0;
00808 
00809     glLoadIdentity();
00810         if(perspective)
00811         {
00812             gluLookAt(ufo->pos.x - 5*ufo->radius,
00813                       ufo->pos.y + 5*ufo->radius,
00814                       ufo->pos.z + 5*ufo->radius,
00815                       ufo->pos.x, ufo->pos.y, ufo->pos.z,
00816                       0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00817         }
00818         else
00819         {
00820             glTranslatef(0.0, 0.0, -(ufo->radius*12.0));
00821             gluLookAt(camX, camY, camZ,
00822                       ufo->pos.x, ufo->pos.y, ufo->pos.z,
00823                       upX, upY, upZ);
00824         }
00825     glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, flmMatrix);
00826 }
00827 
00835 void cGLWidget::resetUfo()
00836 {
00837     objXrot = objZrot = 0.0;
00838     objForward = 0.0;
00839     camY = camZ = 0.0;
00840     camX = -0.001;
00841 
00842     ufo->pos.x = ufo->pos.y = ufo->pos.z = 0.0;
00843     collision = 0;
00844 
00845     glLoadIdentity();
00846     glRotatef(-90, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00847     glGetDoublev(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, ssmMatrix);
00848 }

00870 
00879 int cGLWidget::LoadTextureFromBMP(char *filename, GLuint texture_name)
00880 {
00881   FILE *fin;
00882   int size,width,height;
00883   unsigned short bitcount = 0;
00884   unsigned char *pixels;
00885   unsigned char bmpHeader[54];
00886 
00887   if ((fin = fopen(filename, "rb")) == NULL)
00888     return 1;
00889 
00890   if (fread(bmpHeader, 1, 54, fin) != 54) { // nacitanie BMP hlavicky
00891     fclose(fin);
00892     return 1;
00893   }
00894 
00895   memcpy(&bitcount, &(bmpHeader[28]), 2); // kontrola poctu bodov
00896   if (bitcount != 24) {
00897     fclose(fin);
00898     return 1;
00899   }
00900 
00901   memcpy(&width, &(bmpHeader[18]), 4); // rozmer obrazu
00902   memcpy(&height, &(bmpHeader[22]), 4);
00903   size = width*height*3;
00904 
00905   if ((pixels = (unsigned char *) malloc(size)) == NULL) {
00906     fclose(fin);
00907     return 1;
00908   }
00909 
00910   if (fread(pixels, 1, size, fin) != (unsigned) size) { // nacitanie obrazku
00911     fclose(fin);
00912     free(pixels);
00913     return 1;
00914   }
00915 
00916   fclose(fin);
00917 
00918   // build our texture mipmaps
00919   gluBuild2DMipmaps( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 3, width, height,
00920                      GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pixels);
00921 
00922   glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, texture_name); // pripojenie textur
00923   // nastavenie parametrov texturi
00924   glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00925   glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00926 
00927   glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGB, width, height, 0,
00928                GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pixels);
00929 
00930   free(pixels); // uvolnenie allocovanej pamate
00931   return 0;
00932 }
00933 
00941 void cGLWidget::checkWormhole()
00942 {
00943     if(ufo->pos.x > wormhole->sectors[wormhole->whSectors/2].splinePoint.x)
00944     {
00945         sPoint3 tmpPoint;
00946         for(int i = 0; i < wormhole->nControlPoints/4; i++)
00947         {
00948             wormhole->listControlPoints.removeFirst();
00949             tmpPoint.x = wormhole->listControlPoints.last().x + 1.0;
00950             tmpPoint.y = (rand() % 2000 - 1000) / 1000.0;
00951             tmpPoint.z = (rand() % 2000 - 1000) / 1000.0;
00952             wormhole->listControlPoints.append(tmpPoint);
00953 
00954             wormhole->listControlRadiusPoints.removeFirst();
00955             tmpPoint.x = wormhole->listControlRadiusPoints.last().x + 1.0;
00956             tmpPoint.y = (rand() % 400 + 200) / 1000.0;
00957             tmpPoint.z = 0.0;
00958             wormhole->listControlRadiusPoints.append(tmpPoint);
00959         }
00960         recreateWormhole();
00961 //        lastPaintTime.restart();
00962     }
00963 }
00964 
00973 void cGLWidget::recreateWormhole()
00974 {
00975     wormhole->updateObject(wormhole->whSectors, wormhole->circleSectors);
00976     makeCurrent();
00977     glDeleteLists(wormhole->object, wormhole->nLists);
00978     wormhole->object =
00979         wormhole->makeDisplayList(parentCWidget->settings_polygons);
00980 //    updateGL();
00981 }

00991 void cGLWidget::setCircleSectors(int sectors)
00992 {
00993     if (sectors >= 3 && 200 >= sectors) {
00994         wormhole->updateObject(wormhole->whSectors, sectors);
00995         makeCurrent();
00996         glDeleteLists(wormhole->object, wormhole->nLists);
00997         wormhole->object =
00998             wormhole->makeDisplayList(parentCWidget->settings_polygons);
00999         updateGL();
01000     }
01001 }
01002 
01011 void cGLWidget::setWhSectors(int sectors)
01012 {
01013     if (sectors >= 20 && 400 >= sectors) {
01014         wormhole->updateObject(sectors, wormhole->circleSectors);
01015         makeCurrent();
01016         glDeleteLists(wormhole->object, wormhole->nLists);
01017         wormhole->object =
01018             wormhole->makeDisplayList(parentCWidget->settings_polygons);
01019         updateGL();
01020     }
01021 }

01030 void cGLWidget::setPolygonMode(QString mode)
01031 {
01032     if(mode == "GL_FILL") polygonMode = GL_FILL;
01033     else if(mode == "GL_LINE") polygonMode = GL_LINE;
01034         else if(mode == "GL_POINT") polygonMode = GL_POINT;
01035             else polygonMode = GL_FILL;
01036     updateGL();
01037 }

01046 void cGLWidget::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *event){
01047     key_code = event->key();
01048     switch(event->key())
01049     {
01050         case Qt::Key_Space :
01051             bSpace = true;
01052             break;
01053         case Qt::Key_Up :
01054         case Qt::Key_W :
01055             bUp = true;
01056             //flmZ += 0.01;
01057             break;
01058         case Qt::Key_Down :
01059         case Qt::Key_S :
01060             bDown = true;
01061             //flmZ -= 0.01;
01062             break;
01063         case Qt::Key_Left :
01064         case Qt::Key_A :
01065             bLeft = true;
01066             //flmX += 0.01;
01067             break;
01068         case Qt::Key_Right :
01069         case Qt::Key_D :
01070             bRight = true;
01071             //flmX -= 0.01;
01072             break;
01073         case Qt::Key_F : // fullscreen
01074             toggleFullScreen();
01075             break;
01076         case Qt::Key_C : // reset camera on flm and center on play mode
01077             resetCamera();
01078             break;
01079         case Qt::Key_P : // Play / Pause
01080             playPause();
01081             break;
01082         case Qt::Key_R : // Restart
01083             reset();
01084             break;
01085         case Qt::Key_Q :
01086         case Qt::Key_Escape :
01087             QCoreApplication::quit();
01088             break;
01089         default:
01090             break;
01091     }
01092 
01093     event->ignore();
01094 }
01095 
01105 void cGLWidget::keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent *event){
01106     key_code = event->key();
01107     switch(event->key())
01108     {
01109         case Qt::Key_Up:
01110         case Qt::Key_W:
01111             bUp = false;
01112             break;
01113         case Qt::Key_Down:
01114         case Qt::Key_S :
01115             bDown = false;
01116             break;
01117         case Qt::Key_Left:
01118         case Qt::Key_A:
01119             bLeft = false;
01120             break;
01121         case Qt::Key_Right:
01122         case Qt::Key_D :
01123             bRight = false;
01124             break;
01125         case Qt::Key_Space :
01126             bSpace = false;
01127         default:
01128             break;
01129     }
01130 
01131     event->ignore();
01132 }

01144     bUp = false;

01147     bRight = false;
01148     bSpace = false;

01161 void cGLWidget::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
01162 {
01163     if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton ||
01164         event->buttons() & Qt::RightButton)
01165     {
01166         lastPos = event->pos();
01167     } else if(event->buttons() & Qt::MidButton)
01168     {
01169         resetCamera();
01170     }
01171 
01172     event->ignore();
01173 }
01174 
01182 void cGLWidget::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
01183 {
01184     int dx = event->x() - lastPos.x();
01185     int dy = event->y() - lastPos.y();
01186 
01187     if(event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
01188     {
01189         flmXrot += 8 * dy;
01190         flmYrot += 8 * dx;
01191         objCamXrot += 8 * dy;
01192         objCamYrot += 8 * dx;
01193     } else if (event->buttons() & Qt::RightButton)
01194     {
01195         flmZrot += 8 * dx;
01196     }
01197     lastPos = event->pos();
01198 
01199     event->ignore();
01200 }
01201 
01209 void cGLWidget::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
01210 {
01211     /* Most mouse types work in steps of 15 degrees, in which case the delta
01212        value is a multiple of 120 */
01213     int numDegrees = event->delta() / 120;
01214     float numSteps = numDegrees / 10.0;
01215 
01216     if (event->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal) {
01217         flmZ += numSteps;
01218         if((objCamZoom + numSteps / 10.0) < 0.05 &&
01219            (objCamZoom + numSteps / 10.0) > -0.2)
01220             objCamZoom += numSteps / 10.0;
01221     } else {
01222         flmZ += numSteps;
01223         if((objCamZoom + numSteps / 10.0) < 0.05 &&
01224            (objCamZoom + numSteps / 10.0) > -0.2)
01225             objCamZoom += numSteps / 10.0;
01226     }
01227 
01228     event->ignore();
01229 }
01230 
01238 void cGLWidget::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
01239 {
01240     if(event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
01241     {
01242         toggleFullScreen();
01243     }
01244 }
01245 
01254 void cGLWidget::toggleFullScreen()
01255 {
01256     bFullScreen = !bFullScreen;
01257     if(bPause == false)
01258         this->playPause();
01259 
01260     if(bFullScreen)
01261     { // go full screen
01262         parentCWidget->fullscreenAction->\
01263                 setIcon(QIcon("./images/window_nofullscreen.png"));
01264         parentCWidget->stateCWidget = parentCWidget->windowState();
01265         if(!(parentCWidget->stateCWidget & 7)) // not (minimized or maximized
01266         {                                      //      or fullscreen)
01267             parentCWidget->sizeCWidget = parentCWidget->size();
01268             parentCWidget->posCWidget = parentCWidget->pos();
01269         }
01270         parentCWidget->screenNum = QApplication::desktop()->\
01271                                    screenNumber(parentCWidget);
01272         parentCWidget->hide();
01273         this->setParent(0, Qt::FramelessWindowHint | Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint);
01274         this->setGeometry(QApplication::desktop()->\
01275                           screenGeometry(parentCWidget->screenNum));
01276         this->resize((QApplication::desktop()->\
01277                       screenGeometry(parentCWidget->screenNum)).size());
01278         this->show();
01279         this->setFocus();
01280     }
01281     else
01282     { // go back to windowed mode
01283         parentCWidget->fullscreenAction->\
01284                 setIcon(QIcon("./images/window_fullscreen.png"));
01285         parentCWidget->setCentralWidget(this);
01286         parentCWidget->setGeometry(QApplication::desktop()->\
01287                                    availableGeometry(parentCWidget->screenNum));
01288         parentCWidget->move(parentCWidget->posCWidget);
01289         parentCWidget->resize(parentCWidget->sizeCWidget);
01290 
01291         parentCWidget->setWindowState(parentCWidget->stateCWidget);
01292         parentCWidget->show();
01293         this->setFocus();
01294     }
01295 }
